text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

text: Do or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of… Staying weak is!
author: Fuegoleon Vernillion (Black Clover)

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston S. Churchill

text: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
author: Himura Kenshin (Rurouni Kenshin)

text: The inner workings of my mind are an enigma.
author: Patrick Star (SpongeBob SquarePants)
